description: Extending modelChecker with 15 new academic criteria checks for digital design students

workflow.description: Standard workflow for implementing each new check

steps.name: Implementation
tasks: Create check function in modelChecker_commands.py
Follow existing code patterns and naming conventions
Add comprehensive docstring with algorithm, args, returns, limitations
Handle edge cases (empty selection, invalid geometry)

steps.name: Registration
tasks: Add check to mcCommandsList in modelChecker_list.py
Assign correct category (naming, general, topology, UVs, materials, scene)
Use descriptive label for UI display

steps.name: Testing
tasks: Create test file: tests/test_<check_id>.py
Include minimum 4 test cases: pass, fail, edge case, limitation
Document Maya test script for manual verification
Add test for empty selection handling

steps.name: Integration Testing
tasks: Verify function signature matches UI expectations (nodes, SLMesh)
Verify return format matches UI parser (type, errors)
Check function name matches registration key exactly
Run Python syntax check on modified files
Cross-reference all registered commands have functions

steps.name: Documentation
tasks: Add comprehensive docstring to function
Update CHECKS.md with full check documentation
Document known limitations with workarounds
Include 'Why It Matters' for academic context
Add 'How to Fix' instructions for Maya

steps.name: UI Preview Update
tasks: Update checks-overview.html with new check details
Update index.html to show check as implemented
Deploy updated preview to Vercel
Verify mobile responsiveness

steps.name: Finalization
tasks: Update release-plan.json status to completed
Update statistics counters
Create git commit with descriptive message
Push to remote repository
Update CHANGELOG.md

phase1.name: High Impact
phase1.description: Catches most common student mistakes that result in major point deductions

checks.name: Flipped/Reversed Normals
checks.description: Detect faces pointing wrong direction that render black
checks.why_matters: Reversed normals are one of the most common mistakes that cause renders to fail
limitations: May give false positives on highly concave meshes

checks.name: Overlapping Vertices
checks.description: Detect vertices at same position causing shading/export issues
checks.why_matters: Overlapping vertices create invisible geometry issues that are hard to debug
checks.algorithm_hint: Compare vertex positions within tolerance threshold using MFnMesh.getPoints()

checks.name: Poly/Face Count Limit
checks.description: Verify model stays within configurable polygon budget
checks.why_matters: Academic projects often have strict poly limits - exceeding means point deductions
checks.algorithm_hint: Count faces using MFnMesh.numPolygons, compare against configurable limit

checks.name: Missing Textures
checks.description: Detect broken file paths causing missing textures
checks.why_matters: Submitting a project with missing textures is a guaranteed way to lose points
checks.algorithm_hint: Query file texture nodes, check if referenced files exist on disk

checks.name: Default Materials
checks.description: Detect objects still using lambert1 (unfinished work)
checks.why_matters: Default gray materials signal incomplete work to evaluators
checks.algorithm_hint: Check shading engine connections, flag initialShadingGroup assignments

checks.name: Scene Units Verification
checks.description: Ensure correct scene units (cm/m) for pipeline compatibility
checks.why_matters: Wrong units cause models to appear microscopic or gigantic in other software
checks.algorithm_hint: Query currentUnit -query -linear, validate against expected value

phase2.name: Professional Quality
phase2.description: Industry-standard checks that demonstrate attention to detail and best practices

checks.name: UV Distortion/Stretching
checks.description: Detect stretched UVs causing blurry/warped textures
checks.why_matters: UV distortion ruins texture quality and is immediately visible in renders
checks.algorithm_hint: Calculate ratio between 3D face area and UV face area

checks.name: Texel Density Consistency
checks.description: Verify uniform pixel density across model
checks.why_matters: Inconsistent texel density makes some parts look sharp while others look blurry
checks.algorithm_hint: Measure pixels-per-unit ratio across UV shells, flag outliers

checks.name: Texture Resolution
checks.why_matters: Non-power-of-2 textures waste memory and may not load in game engines
checks.algorithm_hint: Read texture file dimensions, check if powers of 2

checks.name: Unused Materials/Nodes
checks.description: Detect scene clutter from unused materials and nodes
checks.why_matters: Scene clutter indicates unprofessional work habits and increases file size
checks.algorithm_hint: Trace node connections, identify materials with no mesh assignments

checks.name: Hidden Objects Check
checks.why_matters: Hidden objects can unexpectedly appear in renders or cause file bloat
checks.algorithm_hint: Scan visibility attributes of all transform nodes

phase3.name: Polish
phase3.description: Final professional touches that separate good work from excellent work

checks.name: Naming Convention
checks.description: Verify proper prefixes (geo_, grp_, mat_) configurable pattern
checks.why_matters: Proper naming shows professionalism and makes scenes easier to navigate
checks.algorithm_hint: Match node names against configurable regex patterns

checks.name: Outliner Hierarchy Depth
checks.description: Verify logical grouping structure and depth limits
checks.why_matters: Deep messy hierarchies make scenes hard to work with
checks.algorithm_hint: Measure depth of each object in scene hierarchy tree

checks.name: Concave Faces
checks.description: Detect concave polygons causing rendering artifacts
checks.why_matters: Concave faces triangulate unpredictably and may render incorrectly
checks.algorithm_hint: Analyze polygon vertex positions to determine convexity

checks.name: Intermediate Objects
checks.why_matters: Intermediate objects bloat file size and indicate unfinished cleanup
checks.algorithm_hint: Scan for shape nodes marked as intermediate

future_additions.name: Edge Loop Flow
future_additions.description: Verify proper edge loops at joints for deformation

future_additions.name: UV Island Padding
future_additions.description: Verify adequate padding between UV islands

code: Docstring includes algorithm, args, returns, limitations
No hardcoded values where configurable needed
testing: Test file created with 4+ test cases
integration: Check appears in UI under correct category
documentation: How to Fix in Maya included
